ygData.subject: Re: Some pet questions
ygData.msgSnippet: i never got the lvl 12 pet. i went from the lvl 8 to the lvl 16, simply because i was too lazy to go to highkeep for the lvl 12, and because the lvl 8 pet was
ygData.messageBody:
i never got the lvl 12 pet. i went from the lvl 8 to the lvl 16, simply
because i was too lazy to go to highkeep for the lvl 12, and because the
lvl 8 pet was working just fine. now, i never really use my lvl 16 pet. i
group a lot, and when i dont, i might use it depending on where i am. i
spend a lot of time soloing in oasis, and i dont use my pet there for fear
that it might wander and attract an SG.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 17th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule


My conjuration is in the low
>50's, so it's not maxed, but it's nothing to be ashamed of. Anyone else have
>any similar experiences?
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Star Wars fans are using ONElist to share the fun.
>http://www.ONElist.com
>Are you?
>
>
